[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1592921666115{margin-bottom: -20px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/homepage-header-e1591132115768.jpg?id=24277) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592922179715{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”custom-hero-aaron”]

TESTIMONIALS

WEB DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT TESTIMONIALS

For more than 14 years, we have been providing first-class customer service.

SCHEDULE A CONSULTATION TODAY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1537197760045{background-color: #c49f43 !important;}”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1588969221525{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1579202028422{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593557872669{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”padding0100″]

Our mission at A Nerd’s World is to provide top-notch customer service. We’ve built our brand on this, and our in-house team is devoted not only to making our business succeed, but also to ensure that your business succeeds. We value integrity, accountability, passion, community, and enjoyment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593543120361{padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593543169394{padding-top: 40px !important;}”]

CLIENT TESTIMONIALS

We asked our customers to leave a honest reviews about our company. Here’s what they had to say:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593545509379{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1593548578934{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1593548596846{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1593548578934{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1613577881615{padding-bottom: 25px !important;}” el_class=”custom-reviews”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577719769{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Professionalism, Quality, Responsiveness, Value

Chris and his employees provide excellent customer service. They are far the best website company that can do any request you have. They know how to deal with any problems you have in your website. They are super friendly to work with and absolutely get the job done. I highly recommend Chris website company.

Anas Hamed

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577497289{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Bringing my Vision to Reality

From creating my new logo, to building the associated website A Nerd’s World has done an excellent job at bringing my vision to reality. I look forward to working with them on further design projects.

Raoul Coleman of Kong Quest

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577503347{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

They Don’t Over-Promise and Let you Down

We’ve been a long time customer and for our most recent website (our third with nerds world) we have been blown away, followed our mock-ups perfectly, and efficiently. One thing that was refreshing when dealing with the nerds, is they don’t over promise and let you down which many other companies in this industry do so well. These guys give it to you straight and that’s definitely worth something.

Dave Owen of Dozy Sleep (www.dozysleep.ca)

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577512379{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Very Happy with their Services

Grace, Ming and everyone else on the team have been excellent. They have designed a great new site for our business, as well as provided fantastic SEO work. We are very happy with their services.

Luke Howes

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577519289{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Awesome and Easy to Deal with!

These guys were awesome and easy to deal with! Helped us a lot with our website and excellent SEO!

Arianda Garcia

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577525100{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Communication Process was Easy and Very Organized

I was referred by a friend to have A Nerds World company build out our online web presence with an e-commerce website. It’s not an easy task to find a reputable web design company, they did such a great job on our project. Our logo was was perfect and fit our brand 100%, and our web site was delivered on time and on budget. The communication process was easy and very organized from start to finish. I think the Nerds deserves a six star rating.

Nolan Harrington

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577531275{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Delivered way Ahead of the Deadline!

We were in a bit of a pinch having no website up for my brother-in-law’s business. The team at Nerd’s World really eased the pressure on us. They were easy to work with, prompt with design revisions, and really helped us capture our vision. They made this a painless experience, and delivered way ahead of the deadline!

Rudro C

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577536807{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Affordable Pricing and can Accommodate Anyone

A Nerd’s World is a first rate and outstanding webdesign and development company. They have various locations throughout the city of Toronto. They have affordable pricing and can accommodate anyone. Their employees are creative and fun to work with. So go ahead and give them a call.

Christian Bettencourt of The Drive Guy (www.thedriveguy.ca)

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577544269{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Excellent Service, Worth Every Penny!

Excellent service, worth every penny! Everything was great from consultation until the final delivery of our logo that we are in love with.

Sepi

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577551378{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

You Don’t Need to Look any Further

If you need to revamp your business and brand, you don’t need to look any further. These guys got you covered they helped me with my SEO and I can see the difference! Thank you Chris and the team

Iman

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577558967{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Wealthy of Knowledge

I had a great opportunity to work with the nerds. I hired a previous SEO firm and didn’t get real results. After a quick consultation, I have a better understanding and walking away with wealth of knowledge. I saw immediate results and can’t wait to work with them again!

Pablo Gullien

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577564427{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Top-Notch Design!

Excellent customer service and top-notch design!

Ali Al-Saady

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577570618{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Beyond my Expectations

Last winter I was looking to have a website created. I saw nerds world and met with them. What they made for me was beyond my expectations. The gentleman that helped me at the store was so clear with the process and what I was getting. So pleased with my website. I recommend everyone go to nerds world.

Peter Houghton

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577577806{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Great Staff, Great Service, Great Experience.

These bunch of Nerds, know what they’re doing! Great staff, great service, great experience.

Antonio Grossi

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577584146{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Wonderful Experience!

I had a wonderful experience working with A Nerd’s World! This business has a great group supporting it. From owner Chris to manager Charlie and developer – you get the sense that you are in great hands at all levels and stages of the web development process. I was especially impressed by the responsiveness, caring and effort applied to our project.

Alex Allan

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577590159{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Quick to Respond

A Nerd’s World was extremely helpful in assisting me with my website concerns. They provided a succinct one-on-one training session which walked my through all the processes I needed (even a few extra!). Any time I ever have questions about my website they are quick to respond and are always able to give me a detailed answer.

Christine Holmes

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577595723{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Great Service and Great Experience

Great communication, Great service and Great experience for my new logo!

Lavado Stubbs

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577603160{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

My Project was Treated with Respect and Urgency

I called this company at the very last minute because I needed a quick update to my website. My project was treated with respect and urgency. I do a lot of trade shows every year and I am always looking for updates to my website and new printed material. I will call on these guys again in the future.

James S

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577609942{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Worked Tirelessly to get my Website up

ANW team worked tirelessly to get my website up and running. Anytime I have questions they are there for me, helping me find solutions. Can readily recommend them to anyone looking for website creation/support.

Jennifer Emilson

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613577616368{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”]

Loved the Work they Provided

Wow, what an experience. super informative, friendly staff and loved the work they provided. would recommend 10/10

Moon Concepts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
